import React from 'react' import * as Yup from "yup" import axios from "axios" import { Formik, Form, Field, ErrorMessage } from "formik"; function CreatePost() { const initialValues = { title: "", postText: "", username: "" } const onSubmit = (data) => { axios.post("http://localhost:3001/posts",data).then((respone) => { console.log("its work") }) } const validationSchema = Yup.object().shape({ title: Yup.string().required("bir basl覺k eklemek zorundas覺n bu bir ozel mesajdir "), postText: Yup.string().required(), username: Yup.string().min(3).max(15).required(), }) return (
) } export default CreatePost
